CommandGetScore.label: Get Command
CommandGetScore.tooltip: The command to show current score.

CommandNewScore.label: New Command
CommandNewScore.tooltip: The command to create new score.

CommandUpdateScore.label: Update Command
CommandUpdateScore.tooltip: The command to update current score.

CommandResetScore.label: Reset Command
CommandResetScore.tooltip: The command to reset current score.

CommandDeleteScore.label: Delete Command
CommandDeleteScore.tooltip: The command to delete current score.

PermissionOnGet.label: Permission On Get Command
PermissionOnGet.tooltip: Who is able to use the script command to get score.

PermissionOnEdit.label: Permission On New/Update/Reset Commands
PermissionOnEdit.tooltip: Who is able to use the script commands to create/update/reset score.

PermissionDeniedMessage.value: Permission denied: You have to be a {0} to use {1} command!
PermissionDeniedMessage.label: Permission Denied Message
PermissionDeniedMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent on failed permission check. 0 — required permission, 1 — command.

PermissionInfo.label: Info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

InvalidCommandCallMessage.label: Invalid Command Call Message
InvalidCommandCallMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user calls a command with invalid parameters. 0 — command, 1 — command usage example.

NoScoreFoundMessage.label: No Score Found Message
NoScoreFoundMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user tries to get score which is not created.

CurrentScoreMessage.label: Current Score Message
CurrentScoreMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user calls a Get Score command. 0 — current score.

CreatedScoreMessage.label: Created Score Message
CreatedScoreMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent when new score has been created (using New Command). 0 — created score.

RecreatedScoreMessage.value: Score has created already, created the new one: {0}
RecreatedScoreMessage.label: Recreated Score Message
RecreatedScoreMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent when existing score has been recreated (using New Command). 0 — created score.

NothingToUpdateMessage.value: No score found, nothing to update.
NothingToUpdateMessage.label: Nothing To Update Message
NothingToUpdateMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user tries to update nonexistent score (using Update Command).

InvalidScoreValueMessage.value: Failed to update score: invalid score value {0}. Try value in range: {1}.
InvalidScoreValueMessage.label: Invalid Score Value Message
InvalidScoreValueMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user calls an Update Score command with invalid score value. 0 — invalid score value, 1 — valid value range.

UpdatedScoreMessage.label: Updated Score Message
UpdatedScoreMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent when score has been updated (using Update Command). 0 — updated score.

NothingToResetMessage.value: No score found, nothing to reset.
NothingToResetMessage.label: Nothing To Reset Message
NothingToResetMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user tries to reset nonexistent score (using Reset Command).

ResetScoreMessage.label: Reset Score Message
ResetScoreMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent when score has been reset (using Reset Command). 0 — reset score.

NothingToDeleteMessage.value: No score found, nothing to delete.
NothingToDeleteMessage.label: Nothing To Delete Message
NothingToDeleteMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent if user tries to delete nonexistent score (using Delete Command).

DeletedScoreMessage.label: Deleted Score Message
DeletedScoreMessage.tooltip: Chat message will be sent when score has been deleted (using Delete Command). 0 — deleted score.

AllowLoggingToFile.label: Allow Logging To File
AllowLoggingToFile.tooltip: Allow script to log to file in script folder.
